verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> Now after מ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the death יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> of Joshua וַֽיִּשְׁאֲלוּ֙ <S%H7592><s%> asked בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> it came to pass that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יַעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> Who shall go up לָּ֧נוּ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֛י <S%H3669><s%> for us against the Canaanites בַּתְּחִלָּ֖ה <S%H8462><s%> first לְהִלָּ֥חֶם <S%H3898><s%> to fight בּֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah יַעֲלֶ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> shall go up הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> behold נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> behold I have delivered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> into his hand

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוּדָה֩ <S%H3063><s%> And Judah לְשִׁמְע֨וֹן <S%H8095><s%> unto Simeon אָחִ֜יו <S%H251><s%> his brother עֲלֵ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> Come up אִתִּ֣י <S%H854><s%> into בְגוֹרָלִ֗י <S%H1486><s%> with me into my lot וְנִֽלָּחֲמָה֙ <S%H3898><s%> that we may fight בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> against the Canaanites וְהָלַכְתִּ֧י <S%H1980><s%> and I likewise will go גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> turn אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I אִתְּךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> for בְּגוֹרָלֶ֑ךָ <S%H1486><s%> with thee into thy lot וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> So שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H8095><s%> So Simeon

וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכְּנַעֲנִ֥י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֖י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> into their hand וַיַּכּ֣וּם <S%H5221><s%> and they slew בְּבֶ֔זֶק <S%H966><s%> of them in Bezek עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַֽ֠יִּמְצְאוּ <S%H4672><s%> And they found אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנִ֥י בֶ֙זֶק֙ <S%H137><s%> Adonibezek בְּבֶ֔זֶק <S%H966><s%> in Bezek וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> and they fought בּ֑וֹ וַיַּכּ֕וּ <S%H5221><s%> against him and they slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפְּרִזִּֽי׃ <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites

וַיָּ֙נָס֙ <S%H5127><s%> fled אֲדֹ֣נִי בֶ֔זֶק <S%H137><s%> But Adonibezek וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֖וּ <S%H7291><s%> and they pursued אַחֲרָ֑יו <S%H310><s%> after וַיֹּאחֲז֣וּ <S%H270><s%> him and caught אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַֽיְקַצְּצ֔וּ <S%H7112><s%> him and cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּהֹנ֥וֹת <S%H931><s%> his thumbs יָדָ֖יו <S%H3027><s%> and his great וְרַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> and his great toes

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲדֹֽנִי־ בֶ֗זֶק <S%H137><s%> And Adonibezek שִׁבְעִ֣ים ׀ <S%H7657><s%> Threescore and ten מְלָכִ֡ים <S%H4428><s%> kings בְּֽהֹנוֹת֩ <S%H931><s%> their thumbs יְדֵיהֶ֨ם <S%H3027><s%> and their great וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H7272><s%> and their great toes מְקֻצָּצִ֗ים <S%H7112><s%> cut off הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מְלַקְּטִים֙ <S%H3950><s%> gathered תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> up under שֻׁלְחָנִ֔י <S%H7979><s%> [their meat] under my table כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> I עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> as I have done כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so שִׁלַּם־ <S%H7999><s%> hath requited לִ֖י אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> so God וַיְבִיאֻ֥הוּ <S%H935><s%> me And they brought יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> him to Jerusalem וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> and there he died שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there פ

וַיִּלָּחֲמ֤וּ <S%H3898><s%> had fought בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> Now the children יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem וַיִּלְכְּד֣וּ <S%H3920><s%> and had taken אוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> וַיַּכּ֖וּהָ <S%H5221><s%> it and smitten לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> it with the edge חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city שִׁלְּח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> and set בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> on fire

וְאַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> And afterward יָֽרְדוּ֙ <S%H3381><s%> went down בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑י <S%H3669><s%> against the Canaanites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mountain וְהַנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> and in the south וְהַשְּׁפֵלָֽה׃ <S%H8219><s%> and in the valley

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> against the Canaanites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בְּחֶבְר֔וֹן <S%H2275><s%> in Hebron וְשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> (now the name חֶבְר֥וֹן <S%H2275><s%> of Hebron לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> before קִרְיַ֣ת אַרְבַּ֑ע <S%H7153><s%> Kirjath-arba וַיַּכּ֛וּ <S%H5221><s%> beat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁשַׁ֥י <S%H8344><s%> Sheshai וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִימַ֖ן <S%H289><s%> and Ahiman וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּלְמָֽי׃ <S%H8526><s%> and Talmai

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> against the inhabitants דְּבִ֑יר <S%H1688><s%> of Debir וְשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> and the name דְּבִ֥יר <S%H1688><s%> of Debir לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> before קִרְיַת־ סֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H7158><s%> [was] Kirjathsepher

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said כָּלֵ֔ב <S%H3612><s%> And Caleb אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יַכֶּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> He that smiteth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִרְיַת־ סֵ֖פֶר <S%H7158><s%> Kirjathsepher וּלְכָדָ֑הּ <S%H3920><s%> and taketh וְנָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> it to him will I give ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַכְסָ֥ה <S%H5915><s%> Achsah בִתִּ֖י <S%H1323><s%> my daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וַֽיִּלְכְּדָהּ֙ <S%H3920><s%> took עָתְנִיאֵ֣ל <S%H6274><s%> And Othniel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קְנַ֔ז <S%H7073><s%> of Kenaz אֲחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> brother כָלֵ֖ב <S%H3612><s%> Caleb's הַקָּטֹ֣ן <S%H6996><s%> younger מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> it and he gave ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַכְסָ֥ה <S%H5915><s%> him Achsah בִתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּבוֹאָ֗הּ <S%H935><s%> And it came to pass when she came וַתְּסִיתֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5496><s%> [to him] that she moved לִשְׁא֤וֹל <S%H7592><s%> him to ask מֵֽאֵת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1><s%> of her father הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> a field וַתִּצְנַ֖ח <S%H6795><s%> and she lighted מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from הַחֲמ֑וֹר <S%H2543><s%> from off [her] ass וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said לָ֥הּ כָּלֵ֖ב <S%H3612><s%> and Caleb מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> to her What לָּֽךְ׃

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said ל֜וֹ הָֽבָה־ <S%H3051><s%> unto him Give לִּ֣י בְרָכָ֗ה <S%H1293><s%> me a blessing כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> since אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <S%H5045><s%> me a south נְתַתָּ֔נִי <S%H5414><s%> for thou hast given וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> give לִ֖י גֻּלֹּ֣ת <S%H1543><s%> me also springs מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> gave לָ֣הּ כָּלֵ֗ב <S%H3612><s%> And Caleb אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> גֻּלֹּ֣ת <S%H1543><s%> springs עִלִּ֔ית <S%H5942><s%> her the upper וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> גֻּלֹּ֥ת <S%H1543><s%> springs תַּחְתִּֽית׃ <S%H8482><s%> and the nether פ

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children קֵינִי֩ <S%H7017><s%> of the Kenite חֹתֵ֨ן <S%H2859><s%> father in law מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses' עָל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> went up מֵעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> out of the city הַתְּמָרִים֙ <S%H8558><s%> of palms אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> with the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּנֶ֣גֶב <S%H5045><s%> which [lieth] in the south עֲרָ֑ד <S%H6166><s%> of Arad וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people

וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> And Judah אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with שִׁמְע֣וֹן <S%H8095><s%> with Simeon אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brother וַיַּכּ֕וּ <S%H5221><s%> and they slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> that inhabited צְפַ֑ת <S%H6857><s%> Zephath וַיַּחֲרִ֣ימוּ <S%H2763><s%> and utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> was called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> it And the name הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city חָרְמָֽה׃ <S%H2767><s%> Hormah

וַיִּלְכֹּ֤ד <S%H3920><s%> took יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> Also Judah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַזָּ֣ה <S%H5804><s%> Gaza וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבוּלָ֔הּ <S%H1366><s%> with the coast וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַשְׁקְל֖וֹן <S%H831><s%> thereof and Askelon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבוּלָ֑הּ <S%H1366><s%> with the coast וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶקְר֖וֹן <S%H6138><s%> thereof and Ekron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבוּלָֽהּ׃ <S%H1366><s%> with the coast

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> was with יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> was with Judah וַיֹּ֖רֶשׁ <S%H3423><s%> and he drave out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> [the inhabitants of] the mountain כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> but could not לְהוֹרִישׁ֙ <S%H3423><s%> drive out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants הָעֵ֔מֶק <S%H6010><s%> of the valley כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because רֶ֥כֶב <S%H7393><s%> because they had chariots בַּרְזֶ֖ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron לָהֶֽם׃

וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> And they gave לְכָלֵב֙ <S%H3612><s%> unto Caleb אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶבְר֔וֹן <S%H2275><s%> Hebron כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> as Moses וַיּ֣וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3423><s%> and he expelled מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹשָׁ֖ה <S%H7969><s%> thence the three בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> sons הָעֲנָֽק׃ <S%H6061><s%> of Anak

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְבוּסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> the Jebusites יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> that inhabited יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not הוֹרִ֖ישׁוּ <S%H3423><s%> did not drive out בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwell הַיְבוּסִ֜י <S%H2983><s%> but the Jebusites אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> with the children בִנְיָמִן֙ <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this ס

וַיַּעֲל֧וּ <S%H5927><s%> they also went up בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> And the house יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> against Bethel וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD עִמָּֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> with
